citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on
February 8, 2024. The inspector spoke to the licensee on the phone, and she stated that she would not be available for
several hours that day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45am on 
February 8, 2024. The inspector spoke to the licensee on the phone, and she stated that she would not be available for 
several hours that day. 
 
 
End Section
